# Goals & Objectives



## Setup

Load *GCL-R-Functions* and all necessary packages.
```{r setup, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
source("~/../R/Functions.GCL.R")
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

.username <- "krshedd"
.password <- ""
```

Read in those objects and `LocusControl`
```{r load_objects}
load_objects("../Objects/")
```

# Winter troll: import mixture genotypes

Read in genotypes from *LOKI* as `.gcl` objects. Save in directory.
```{r winter_loki}
my_silly <- "KGILL19D83"
LOKI2R_GAPS.GCL(sillyvec = my_silly, username = .username, password = .password)
rm(.username, .password)

sapply(my_silly, function(silly) {get(paste0(silly, ".gcl"))$n} )

save_sillys(sillyvec = my_silly, path = "../Genotypes/original")
```
